title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 201 - Determination of Representation Status under Section 207 of the Act
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 201 - Determination of Representation Status under Section 207 of the Act

State Regulations
§ 201.1 - Scope
§ 201.2 - Petition; filing
§ 201.3 - Time for filing of petitions
§ 201.4 - Showing of interest
§ 201.5 - Contents of petition for certification; contents of petition for decertification; contents of petition to clarify existing unit or to determine unit placement of positions; response to petition
§ 201.6 - Publication
§ 201.7 - Notice of pending petitions
§ 201.8 - Investigation and election
§ 201.9 - Employer applications for designation of persons as managerial or confidential
§ 201.10 - Decision by administrative law judge
§ 201.11 - Exceptions to decision of administrative law judge; action by board
§ 201.12 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 201

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, art. 14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
